translation.msg_start: Hi, I am your Runes wallet and Red Envelope (RE) Assistant! üéâPlay $RICH Red Envelopes, Win 20M $RICH and Earn a Super Spreader NFT Learn Howüëâhttps://bit.ly/4bMERC7 ‚ùìüßß How to create and send RE? ‚ÄîSTEP 1. Snatch RE in groups, or deposit Runes to your RE wallet address. ‚ÄîSTEP 2. Create RE. /create [Amount][Shares] e.g. /create 1000 5 Create RE in this private chat. ‚ÄîSTEP 3. Send the RE you created to a group or a friend. Send me to the group or friend before sending your RE to them. /send [No.] This is the number of your RE. You can see all your RE numbers by typing /list e.g. /send 1003 üåê Join TG Groupüëâ https://t.me/hopeyouget_rich
translation.msg_help: üéâPlay $RICH Red Envelopes, Win 20M $RICH and Earn a Super Spreader NFT Learn Howüëâhttps://bit.ly/4bMERC7 üåê Join TG Groupüëâ https://t.me/hopeyouget_rich Commands available in private chat. /start Shows welcome menu and dashboard /wallet Shows the balance of your Runes and/or ICP assets. Shows your RE wallet address /create [Amount][Shares] e.g. /create 1000 5 /list Shows all your created REs and their RE identification No. /send [No.] Send RE to a group or friend. e.g. /send 871 /revoke [No.] RE‚Äôs expire after 24 hours. Revoke an RE and any remaining Runes return to your wallet. e.g. /revoke 871 /transfer [Amount][Address] Transfer RICH to an ICP or BTC Address. Transferring to BTC costs a bit more. e.g. /transfer 1000 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe e.g. /transfer 1000 [BTC Address] /transfer ICP [Amount] [Address] Transfer ICP to ICP Address e.g. /transfer ICP 35 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe /preswap [Amount] Trial swap $RICH ‚Üí$ICP shows exchange rate and outcome e.g. /preswap 100 Trial swap $ICP ‚Üí$RICH shows exchange rate and outcome e.g. /preswap ICP 0.5 /swap [Amount] Executes swap $RICH ‚Üí$ICP e.g. /swap 100 Executes swap $ICP ‚Üí$RICH e.g. /swap ICP 0.5 /spreaders Shows spreaders leaderboard /referrals [page] Shows your referrals in pages (page can be omitted) e.g. /referrals 1 /help Show full command list.
translation.msg_how_to_create:
Create RE command:

/create [Amount][Shares]
e.g. /create 500 5

Add the F flag to create a fixed amount in each share.
e.g. /create 500 5 F

You can also add a blessing text of up to 140 characters.
e.g. /create 500 5 F Good luck in the New Year!
translation.msg_how_to_transfer:
Transfer Command

/transfer [Amount][Address]
Transfer RICH to an ICP or BTC Address. Transferring to BTC costs a bit more.
e.g. /transfer 1000 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe
e.g. /transfer 1000 [BTC Address]

/transfer ICP [Amount] [Address]
Transfer ICP to ICP Address
e.g. /transfer ICP 35 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe
translation.msg_how_to_preswap:
Preswap command:

/preswap [Amount]
Trial swap to show outcomes.
e.g. /preswap 100

Add ICP before [Amount] to indicate you want to swap $ICP to $RICH
e.g. /preswap ICP 0.5
translation.msg_how_to_swap:
Swap command:

/swap [Amount]
Execute swap.
e.g. /swap 100

Add ICP before [Amount] to indicate you want to swap $ICP to $RICH
e.g. /swap ICP 0.5
translation.msg_wallet_notice:
Cross chain transfer $RICH from Bitcoin to your RE Wallet with the Omnity Hub at https://www.omnity.network/
Note: that while your RE Telegram wallet is easy to use, it is not suitable for storing large amounts of assets.

translation.msg_send_failed_user:
You shared RE failed. He/She is not a friend with Omnity REBot.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} with your friends
translation.msg_send_failed_group:
You shared RE failed. Omnity REBot @{{botname}} is not in the group.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} to group administrators
translation.msg_preswap_notice: Execute /swap quickly if the price is good because it keeps changing. Swap here is only for casual usage. For serious trading, please visit https://www.helixmarkets.io/ or https://iclight.io/
